item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Here's the meet up we've been discussing on email. Let's meet at the Chapel at the West Parish Garden Cemetery in Andover on route 133.

See the website link for the map of the cemetary and other information.
http://www.westparish...

Directions off the website are:

The Chapel is located within the West Parish Garden Cemetery in Andover, MA 01810 (978-475-3902).

Take I-93 to Exit 43, Rt. 133 toward Andover.
Proceed exactly one (1) mile on Rt. 133 (a.k.a. Lowell Street).
Turn right into the Cemetery at the Lowell Street Gate marked with a red sign for ?The Chapel at West Parish 1909?.
Proceed down the lane for approximately 50 yards to the Chapel.

Hope to see you there!
Kristin
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Chapel between 7 and 7:15
item.name: West Parish Garden Cemetery Andover
